name.baseName: 直接还原铁生产;直接还原铁;天然气直接还原（MID）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) produced using the Natural Gas Direct Reduction (NG-DR) method, specifically the MID process, is used primarily as a raw material for steelmaking. In contrast to traditional blast furnace methods, NG-DR offers a cleaner and more energy-efficient means of producing iron units for use in electric arc furnaces (EAFs) or for further processing into various steel products.
使用天然气直接还原（MID）方法生产的直接还原铁（DRI）主要用作炼钢的原材料。与传统高炉方法相比，天然气直接还原提供了一种更清洁、更节能的生产铁单元的方式，用于电弧炉（EAF）中或进一步加工成各种钢铁产品。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The average operating data of Coal-DR, NG-DR (MID), and NG-DR (ENE) demonstration projects in China are used as the benchmark for the LCI of DR routes.

technology.technologicalApplicability: Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) produced using the Natural Gas Direct Reduction (NG-DR) method, specifically the MID process, is used primarily as a raw material for steelmaking. In contrast to traditional blast furnace methods, NG-DR offers a cleaner and more energy-efficient means of producing iron units for use in electric arc furnaces (EAFs) or for further processing into various steel products.
使用天然气直接还原（MID）方法生产的直接还原铁（DRI）主要用作炼钢的原材料。与传统高炉方法相比，天然气直接还原提供了一种更清洁、更节能的生产铁单元的方式，用于电弧炉（EAF）中或进一步加工成各种钢铁产品。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China
The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing the Life Cycle Inventory (LCI) data of Direct Reduced Iron production routes, ensure appropriate modeling of the specific technology (Coal-DR, NG-DR (MID), NG-DR (ENE), COG-DR, H-DR) adapted in the process. Since LCI is based on the average operating data from demonstration projects and supplemented by literature data from simulations, laboratory tests, and process modeling, users should confirm the alignment of their context with the Chinese benchmarks provided. Considerations of scaled-up feasibility, technology maturity, and regional variability must be taken into account for accuracy. For routes not fully scaled-up in China, such as COG-DR and H-DR routes, additional care should be taken to adapt the LCI data to the specific context of deployment.

在使用直接还原铁生产路线的生命周期清单（LCI）数据时，确保适当地模拟特定技术（煤基直接还原Coal-DR, 天然气直接还原（MID）NG-DR (MID), 天然气直接还原（ENE）NG-DR (ENE), 焦炉气直接还原COG-DR, 氢直接还原H-DR）在过程中的应用。由于LCI是基于示范项目的平均运营数据，并辅以模拟、实验室测试和过程建模等文献数据得出的，用户应确认其使用环境与提供的中国基准相符。在准确性上，必须考虑规模化可行性、技术成熟度和区域可变性。对于在中国尚未完全规模化的路线，如COG-DR和H-DR路线，应额外注意将LCI数据适应于部署的特定环境。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
